1.content: Set up GitHub repository with access token
1.details: Create repository 'bang-game' and configure with user's access token from environment variables

2.content: Design BANG! game architecture and technology stack
2.details: Define client-server architecture, choose technologies (React frontend, Node.js backend with Socket.io), plan WebSocket communication protocol for room management and game state synchronization

3.content: Implement backend server with WebSocket support
3.details: Create Node.js/Express server with Socket.io integration. Implement room management (create/join rooms), player management, game state management, and WebSocket event handlers for real-time communication

4.content: Develop BANG! game logic and rules engine
4.details: Implement core BANG! game mechanics: player roles (Sheriff, Deputy, Outlaw, Renegade), card system (BANG!, Missed!, cards), character abilities, turn-based gameplay, victory conditions

5.details: Create responsive web interface with game board visualization, player cards display, card selection system, real-time game state updates, room lobby, and game status indicators

6.details: Implement Socket.io client integration, event handlers for game actions (play cards, draw cards, target selection), real-time state synchronization, and error handling

7.details: Test multiplayer gameplay, room creation/joining, WebSocket reliability, game rules validation, and deploy to web server with proper configuration
